snippet: Colombia's right-wing challenger Oscar Ivan Zuluaga conceded defeat to President Juan Manuel Santos who won a second mandate in Sunday's presidential election, in which he has vowed to conclude a peace process he launched with Marxist FARC rebels....

headline.print_headline: Colombia's Zuluaga Concedes Defeat to Santos in Presidential Race
headline.main: Colombia's Zuluaga Concedes Defeat to Santos in Presidential Race

lead_paragraph: Colombia's right-wing challenger Oscar Ivan Zuluaga conceded defeat to President Juan Manuel Santos who won a second mandate in Sunday's presidential election, in which he has vowed to conclude a peace process he launched with Marxist FARC rebels.
